text: 1:28 Efesus 4:13; 5:27Ezɨ e Kraisɨn Akar Aghuim bar vaghvagha gumazamizibav kɨri. E kamaghɨn ifonge, me Krais ko porogh ikɨva fofozir aghuitamɨn oteveghan kogham, eghtɨ e me inigh Godɨn damazimɨn mangam. Kamaghsua, e nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozir aghuimɨn gɨn ghua men sure gamua, egha akar gavgavim me ganɨdi.
